channel.title: HPC on Caleb Fultz
channel.description: Recent content in HPC on Caleb Fultz

item.title: Move over NRAO, here I come UVA!
item.description: It’s been real! For the past 5 years, I have slaved at the National Radio Astronomy Observatory. And by slaved, I mean s-l-a-v-e-d. I made less money than typical System Administrators/Engineers at my level doing pretty much anything and everything you can imagine to keep the Observatory’s HPC environment functioning as best as it could with the EXTREMELY limited budget that we are given to work with after the Science staff have their way with it.
